description: The problem is a StopIteration error due to a difference in the number of elements in two iterators. The code is attempting to iterate through two iterators at the same time, but one of the iterators has fewer elements than the other. As a result, when the code
code:

def difference(num1, num2): 
    return num1 - num2

num1 = 10
num2 = 5
